articles.title: Josh Donaldson, Jameson Taillon lift Yankees over Mariners to snap skid - New York Post
articles.description: The Yankees got back to winning on Monday, snapping their season-high five-game losing streak.
articles.content:
SEATTLE After a miserable few days in St. Louis, the Yankees got back to winning on Monday, snapping their season-high five-game losing streak with a 9-4 win over the Mariners at T-Mobile Park.
